definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
jeweled palace in the fairy mountain

sentences.english: "Yingzhou" is one of the three ancient fairy mountains on the sea.
sentences.chinese: 瀛洲還是古老的海上三仙山之一。

sentences.english: I live in a small mountain town called Fairmount.
sentences.chinese: 我生活在叫仙山的山區小鎮。

sentences.english: Then he heard a sacred mountain in the sea.
sentences.chinese: 忽聞海上有仙山，山在虛無縹緲間。

sentences.english: Cha Shan mountains at this time like Joan Tower, and disappeared the next.
sentences.chinese: 此時的槎山宛如仙山瓊閣，時隱時現。

sentences.english: If the next life we still can be turned into birds, wandering in the mountains of Penglai.
sentences.chinese: 是否來生我們依然可以化成青鳥，徘徊在蓬萊仙山。

definition: Lingshan county in Qinzhou 欽州|钦州[Qin1 zhou1], Guangxi
the Jade lake on Mount Kunlun, residence of Xi Wangmu 西王母
Temple in Heaven (e.g. of the Jade Emperor)
underground palace of ghouls, e.g. Asgard of Scandinavian mythology
Yingzhou, easternmost of three fabled islands in Eastern sea, home of immortals and source of elixir of immortality
Penglai county level city in Yantai 煙台|烟台, Shandong/Penglai, one of three fabled islands in Eastern sea, abode of immortals/by extension, fairyland
